# NWProtocolWebSocket.Opcode.cont

**Case**

A continuation message.

## Declaration

```swift
case cont
```

## Discussion

Continuations are handled automatically, and should not be manually sent.

## Data Types

- **NWProtocolWebSocket.Opcode.binary**: A binary data message.
- **NWProtocolWebSocket.Opcode.text**: A text data message.
title: NWProtocolWebSocket.Opcode.cont
